pkgmetadata.longdescription: English | [简体中文](README-CN.md)![](https://aliyunsdk-pages.alicdn.com/icons/AlibabaCloud.svg)## Alibaba Cloud Ram SDK for Python## Requirements- Python >= 3.6## Installation- **Install with pip**Python SDK uses a common package management tool named `pip`. If pip is not installed, see the [pip user guide](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installing/ "pip User Guide") to install pip.```bash# Install the alibabacloud_ram20150501pip install alibabacloud_ram20150501```## Issues[Opening an Issue](https://github.com/aliyun/alibabacloud-sdk/issues/new), Issues not conforming to the guidelines may be closed immediately.## Usage[Quick Examples](https://github.com/aliyun/alibabacloud-python-sdk/blob/master/docs/0-Usage-EN.md#quick-examples)## ChangelogDetailed changes for each release are documented in the [release notes](./ChangeLog.md).## References- [Latest Release](https://github.com/aliyun/alibabacloud-sdk/tree/master/python)## License[Apache-2.0](http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)Copyright (c) 2009-present, Alibaba Cloud All rights reserved.
